      public List<item> itemToPut

  • Constructor Details

    • BOOKSHELF

      public BOOKSHELF()

  • Method Details

    • putItems

      public boolean putItems(int m, int a, int b, int c)
      This method places the items drawn in this turn in the bookshelf ( array item[][] ).
      Parameters:
      m - value of the column in which to place the items
      a - place order of the first item in the ItemToPut array
      b - place order of the second item in the ItemToPut array
      c - place order of the third item in the ItemToPut array
      Returns:
      If there is no space to place the items in the column, it returns false. If there is space to place the items in the column, it increments the item counter, that counts the number of items in the bookshelf, and deletes the drawn items saved in the array ItemToPut, then it return true.

    • checkAdjacentItem

      public int checkAdjacentItem(item comp)
      This method return the score of the adjacent items of type by searching the number of items touching each other with the method dfs(), and then it applies the game logic to return the real score.
      Parameters:
      comp - is the type of item to check.
      Returns:
      the score for that type of item.

    • getGrid

      public item[][] getGrid()
      This method return the attribute Grid of this class.
      Returns:
      Grid attribute.

    • firstFreeRow

      public int firstFreeRow(int x)
      This method checks the attribute Grid of this class in the column with index 'x'.
      Parameters:
      x - is the index of the column to check.
      Returns:
      the index of the first row of the checked column that is not occupied with an item. The column is checked from the bottom (row index 5) to the top (row index 0).
